overview:
A Silicon Valley veteran, Tom Paquin oversees product development at OnLive as its VP of engineering. With more than 20 years of management experience at leading technology companies, Tom has a successful track record of launching startups and establishing them as household names.

Most notably, Tom helped found Netscapeâ€”the company that popularized Web browsingâ€”and was named its first fellow. During his tenure at Netscape, Tom led the engineering of browsers and servers for Netscape 1.0 and 2.0, and spearheaded many innovative initiatives, such as the development of SSL and Web â€œcookies.â€ He later founded Mozilla.org, the not-for-profit company responsible for such successful software as the Firefox Web browser and the Thunderbird email application.
